page.title: 15My Dads spare time. D.Brown
page.content: In his spare time my dad goes gardening. He has three large gardens and one smaller garden. He grows most vegetables. My favourite vegetables are peas. Every he enters his best vegetables in shows. He normally wins something every year with his leeks, as leek growing is very popular custom in this area. We get most of our vegetables from our gardens and freeze them in our large freezer. My dad also grows flowers for my mam. He sometimes enters flowers in shows as he grows a lot of different flowers. We have flowers on our windowsils all around the house. My dad weeds the garden, cuts the grass and it is obvious to me that he enjoys gardening very much. I have my own small garden at the back of the house.
